altername_name: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: Ring of Fates
最终幻想水晶编年史: 命运指环
name: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: Ring of Fates
overview: Yuri and Chelinka are fraternal twins who live happily with their father in a small village, but their happiness comes to an abrupt end when an ancient evil force arrives. Now, with his family shattered, Yuri begins to train so that he can be strong enough to fight when the evil returns. Yuri and Chelinka set out on their quest to find their friends, avenge their family, and heal their world.
